content:
PrimaryReplicatorStatus Class

Definition

Provides statistics about the Service Fabric Replicator, when it is functioning in a Primary role.

In this Article

public sealed class PrimaryReplicatorStatus : System.Fabric.Query.ReplicatorStatus
Inheritance
Object
ReplicatorStatus
PrimaryReplicatorStatus

Constructors

PrimaryReplicatorStatus()

Initializes a new instance of the PrimaryReplicatorStatus class.

Properties

RemoteReplicators

Gets the status of all the secondary replicas that the primary is aware of.
ReplicationQueueStatus

Gets the status of the Replication queue.
